page_content:
April  
2015Amazon announced that it has joined the American Council on 
Renewable Energy (ACORE) and will participate in the U.S. Partnership 
for Renewable Energy Finance (U.S. PREF) to increase its work with 
state and federal policymakers and other stakeholders to enable more 
renewable energy opportunities for cloud providers.
January 
2015AWS announced it has teamed with Pattern Development to construct 
and operate Amazon Wind Farm Fowler Ridge. 
November 
2014AWS shared its long-term commitment to achieve 100% renewable 
energy usage for the global AWS infrastructure footprint.
58
Sustainability in the Cloud
